channel.title: HELP Friends cant connect
channel.description: Omg soo many problems... Anyways..i portforwarded..i downloaded duc..i changed the ip...i run it it says "Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:435694" What do i do..? i changed the ip client sided

item.title: HELP Friends cant connect
item.dc:creator: @hdmodzz hdmodzz
item.description:
@hdmodzz wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:2, topic:385341”]Its automatically set to say 0.0.0.0

If you don’t like it or there is some other reason you dont want it, I believe you can change it in server.java. But if your friends can’t connect, you did something wrong.[/quote]

I downloaded the thing from no-ip i got that running…
i portforwarded atleast i think i did i changed the ip… is there a simpler way to portfoward could that be it?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Friends cant connect
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Its automatically set to say 0.0.0.0

If you don’t like it or there is some other reason you dont want it, I believe you can change it in server.java. But if your friends can’t connect, you did something wrong.

Read full topic
